meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ferocious.
meanings.sent1: The ferocities of the lion were evident in its fierce roar.
meanings.sent2: The ferocities of the tiger were on full display during the hunt.
meanings.sent3: The ferocities of the puppy trying to play with a big dog were both adorable and brave.
meanings.sent4: The ferocities of the storm were like a wild beast unleashed upon the land.
meanings.sent5: The ferocities of the dragon in the story made it a truly terrifying creature.
